text: temporary use of existing license plates notwithstanding rsa any resident of this state who purchases a motor vehicle in another state from another person or who is unable to register a vehicle because of limited hours of operation of the town clerk in the town where the person resides may display an existing valid new hampshire license plate registered in their name for a period of days from the date of sale this paragraph shall not apply to vehicles purchased from a dealership the director shall adopt rules pursuant to rsa to administer this section
